title: Hello I need to send my phone for repair. WIFI connecting issue.
content:
Dear Sir,

I am facing in connecting wifi in my google pixel XL 4, if I click on wifi then it's not getting connected to my wifi, sometimes it gets connect for while, and then again it starts searching for connection and don't get connect. my pixel 4xl IMEI No: 352930103155547

Please help I need to send my Pixel for service.

Best Regards

Abdulsamad Balwa.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
